title: Is there a from...import * equivalent of idaapi.require()?
content: Loading your own modules from your IDAPython scripts with idaapi.require() suggests using idaapi.require() to load user modules in IDAPython scripts. However in my script, I have extensively used from <mymodule> import * statement so that I don't need to prepend mymodule before every item I use. Is there any IDAPython equivalent to that?

comments.text: Wouldn't you technically be allowed to use both? I.e. first use idaapi.require() ... if it fails the from ... import ... will anyway never get hit unless you somehow decided to ignore the possible failure idaapi.require() yields. No?
